content: मौसल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ली|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मुसल-अण्] {@--1@} Formed like a club, club-shaped. {@--2@} Fought with clubs (as a battle). {@--3@} Relating to the battle with clubs (as a {%parvan%}; in this {%parvan%} is narrated the death of Kṛṣṇa and Balarāma, and the self-destruction of Kṛṣṇa's family through the curse of Brāhmaṇas). --लः A kind of {%madhuparka%}.
